name: CMSeeK
description: A content management system (CMS) manages the creation and modification of digital content. It typically supports multiple users in a collaborative environment. Some noteable examples are: WordPress, Joomla, Drupal etc.
author: Tuhinshubhra
keywords: wordpress, scanner, cmseek, cms, joomla, drupal

name: DNSSEC-Check
description: This little scanner checks programmatically whether a domain is DNSSEC protected.
author: turtlemonvh

name: Dummy
description: This tool is just a test program printing some beautiful tree!
author: David Dewes

name: LooongWaitTest
description: This tool exceeds its runtime limitations.
author: David Dewes

name: PortScanner
description: Scans a bunch of security-relevant ports and checks whether they are opened to public or either behind a firewall or entirely closed.
author: David Dewes

name: RED HAWK
description: All in one tool for Information Gathering and Vulnerability Scanning
author: Tuhinshubhra

name: Securityheaders
description: Python script to check HTTP security headers. Same functionality as securityheaders.io but as Python script. Also checks some server/version headers. Written and tested using Python 3.4.
author: juerkkil

name: SSL-Verify
description: The SSL certificates are the Secure Sockets Layer certificates used for encryption and authentication. This small Python script verifies the used SSL-certificate for any website.
author: Walter Russel

name: Wordpress-Scanner
description: A Wordpress Scanner written in PHP, focus on vulnerability assessment and security audit of misconfiguration in the Wordpress installation. Wordpress Scanner is capable of finding the flaws in the Wordpress installation and will provide all the information regarding the vulnerability. Wordpress Scanner is not a tool for code auditing, it performs black box scanning for the Wordpress powered web application.
author: Wphackedhelp

name: WPSys-Check
description: This tool parses the websites WP version and requests known vulnerabilities from a public knowledge database provided by WPSys
author: David Dewes

name: Performance-Check
description: Measures the time needed for the website to open, respond and close again.
author: GeeksForGeeks

name: AbuseIPDB-Scanner
description: This is a python script that will parse IP addresses from files or manually interact with AbuseIPDB API. It will return the information about the IP into standard out in various outputs.
author: Mikebanks
keywords: general, cms, apache, ip, abuse, scanner, lookup
